main event: Witnesses observed a cigar-shaped object moving back and forth in the sky near Miamisburg, Ohio on November 9, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as resembling a cigar wrapped in tinfoil., The sighting lasted for approximately fifteen to eighteen minutes., Witnesses noted the object reflected the sun at times and appeared solid and shiny., The object was seen at a high altitude and seemed to rotate slowly., It eventually disappeared behind some distant treetops and was reported to have made no noise.
witness description: Various witnesses including a technician and a research chemist.
